messages.subject: Re: Thanks...
messages.msgSnippet: Dear list members, I second that. Thank you very much for the link. It really allowed me to learn so much more about Musashi-san. I will contribute what I can,
messages.messageBody:
Dear list members,
I second that. Thank you very much for the link. It
really allowed me to learn so much more about Musashi-san. I will contribute
what I can, when I can, as I currently study Bikenjutsu, and have over a
year of kendo training, as part of my aikido syllabus. So I have some
experience of the sword and it's combat application, as well as some
historical knowledge on the origins of the samurai sword, thanks to this
list, and to many other fellow practitioners of martial arts around the
world. So I'll try to help with whatever I can.

Kagemaru.

messages.subject: Thanks...
messages.msgSnippet: There are no words for me to express my gratitude for whoever sent this mail whith the Musashi site link.If anyone has some more information on the man I
messages.messageBody:
There are no words for me to express my gratitude
for whoever sent this mail whith the 'Musashi site'
link.If anyone has some more information on the man I
sure hope won't keep it only for him/herself...Thanks again...A.
